AdViewModel.Description:
Want style, comfort and hands free technology? The 2017 Ford Fusion is what you need! With the 4 cylinder 2.5L engine, bluetooth compatibility with back up camera and sleek look, the 2017 Ford Fusion provides you a smooth ride within your drive! 

The 2017 Ford Fusion is equipped with a 2.5L engine to give you power and fuel savings in a sedan sized model vehicle. It has BLUETOOTH to connect to your phone to use for calls and music. The Fusion is equipped with a back up camera for rear surroundings. The Fusion has its comfortable leather seats. The vehicle is also equipped with alloy rims to give it as more sleek look with its push to start to start the vehicle!

The vehicle includes SAFETY Certification with a 60 day Sevan Auto warranty + HST

Here at Sevan Auto Sales, want to give you just the right vehicle for you! We practice only the best and are determined to illustrate our care and attention 100% towards any vehicle we have in store! Our number one policy is to be HONEST with you and feel right at home. We are a foundation that is a FAMILY BUSINESS and have been striving through the market with nothing but love and care! 

For any information PLEASE call us. ALSO please come on in to see the vehicle to get a better look!
**********
809 Arrow Road M9M 2L4
